meta.keywords: Maps API for JavaScript, API Explorer, Playground, JS Examples

examples.title: Map at a specified location
examples.shortDescription: Display a map at a specified location and zoom level

examples.title: Change map style at runtime
examples.shortDescription: Change a style of the map feature when map is instantiated

examples.title: Interactive base map
examples.shortDescription: Retrieve information associated with the map features

examples.title: View bounds of the tilted map
examples.shortDescription: Visualize the visible area of the tilted and rotated map

examples.title: Map using View Bounds
examples.shortDescription: Display a map of a given area

examples.title: Multi-language support
examples.shortDescription: Display a map with labels in a foreign language

examples.title: Changing from the Metric System
examples.shortDescription: Display a map including a scale bar in miles or yards

examples.title: Panning the Map
examples.shortDescription: Programmatically pan the map so that it is continually in motion

examples.title: Restrict Map Movement
examples.shortDescription: Restrict a moveable map to a given rectangular area

examples.title: Zoom into Bounds
examples.shortDescription: Zoom into bounds limiting maximum level

examples.title: Take a Snapshot of the Map
examples.shortDescription: Capture an area on the map

examples.title: Synchronising Two Maps
examples.shortDescription: This example shows two maps. The upper map allows for moving and zooming. The lower map observes the upper map's zoom level and position and adopts these values every time the upper map changes.

examples.title: Display KML Data
examples.shortDescription: Parse a KML file and display the data on a map.

examples.title: Adding an Overlay to the Map
examples.shortDescription: This example displays a movable map initially centered on the historical centre of Berlin (52.515, °N, 13.405°E) with an overlay of a historical map from 1789 on top of the base map. A public domain image was used as a source, and split it into individual map tiles. Additional tiles are only downloaded when the zoom level or location changes.

examples.title: Calculating a Location from a Mouse Click
examples.shortDescription: Obtain the latitude and longitude of a location within the map

examples.title: Example Template
examples.shortDescription: Capture an area on the map

examples.title: Marker on the Map
examples.shortDescription: Display a map highlighting points of interest

examples.title: DOM Marker
examples.shortDescription: Display a marker that is capable of receiving DOM events

examples.title: SVG Graphic Markers
examples.shortDescription: Display a map with custom SVG markers

examples.title: Finding the Nearest Marker
examples.shortDescription: Find a marker nearest to the click location

examples.title: Ordering Overlapping Markers
examples.shortDescription: Arrange the order in which a series of map objects are displayed

examples.title: Zooming to a Set of Markers
examples.shortDescription: Alter the viewport to ensure a group of objects are visible

examples.title: Draggable Marker
examples.shortDescription: Display a moveable marker on a map

examples.title: Polyline on the Map
examples.shortDescription: Display a map with a line showing a known route

examples.title: Polygon on the Map
examples.shortDescription: Display a map highlighting a region or area

examples.title: Polygon with Holes on the Map
examples.shortDescription: Display a map highlighting a region or area

examples.title: Circle on the Map
examples.shortDescription: Display a map highlighting a circular region

examples.title: Rectangle on the map
examples.shortDescription: Display a map highlighting a retangular region or area

examples.title: Marker Clustering
examples.shortDescription: Cluster multiple markers together to better visualize the data

examples.title: Marker Clustering with Custom Theme
examples.shortDescription: Cluster multiple markers and customize the theme

examples.title: Map Objects Events
examples.shortDescription: Handle events on various map objects

examples.title: Map Objects Event Delegation
examples.shortDescription: Use event delegation on map objects

examples.title: Opening an Infobubble on a Mouse Click
examples.shortDescription: Open an infobubble when a marker is clicked

examples.title: Map with Driving Route from A to B
examples.shortDescription: Request a driving route from A to B and display it on the map

examples.shortDescription: Request a walking route from A to B and display it on the map

examples.title: Map with Route from A to B using Public Transport
examples.shortDescription: Request a route from A to B using public transport and display it on the map

examples.title: Search for a Location based on an Address
examples.shortDescription: Request a location using a free-form text input and display it on the map

examples.shortDescription: Request a location from a structured address and display it on the map

examples.title: Search for the Address of a Known Location
examples.shortDescription: Request address details for a given location and display it on the map

examples.title: Search for a Landmark
examples.shortDescription: Request the location of a landmark and display it on the map

examples.title: Data Matching with the Advanced Data Sets
examples.shortDescription: Match routing result with the Advanced Data Sets data
